detail_desc: Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline and long sleeves.
Dungarees in narrow-striped cotton corduroy with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, a seam at the waist with wide elastication at the back, side pockets and tapered legs.
Dungarees in narrow-striped cotton corduroy with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, a seam at the waist with wide elastication at the back, side pockets and tapered legs.
Shorts in checked flannel with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Shorts in checked flannel with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Shorts in an airy cotton and linen weave with diagonal side pockets and elastication, a short frill trim and decorative bow with tassels at the waist.
Shorts in an airy cotton and linen weave with diagonal side pockets and elastication, a short frill trim and decorative bow with tassels at the waist.
Ankle-length, off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a soft linen and viscose weave with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Ankle-length, off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a soft linen and viscose weave with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Skater skirt in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Skater skirt in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Skater skirt in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a frill-trimmed grandad collar, frilled button placket, long sleeves and narrow, frill-trimmed cuffs with a button.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a frill-trimmed grandad collar, frilled button placket, long sleeves and narrow, frill-trimmed cuffs with a button.
Short skirt in cotton twill with a high waist and wrapover front with concealed buttoning in the waist band and a wide, detachable belt. Patch pockets with a flap. Unlined.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top, short, wide sleeves and an elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top, short, wide sleeves and an elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a viscose weave with embroidery on the front, a deep V-neck and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a viscose weave with embroidery on the front, a deep V-neck and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Shimmering dance shoes with an elastic strap over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Short top in patterned viscose jersey with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at one side. Long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at one side. Long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood. Low dropped shoulders, concealed pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood. Low dropped shoulders, concealed pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood. Low dropped shoulders, concealed pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood. Low dropped shoulders, concealed pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gently flared skirt in a soft, fine knit with covered elastication at the waist.
Gently flared skirt in a soft, fine knit with covered elastication at the waist.
Gently flared skirt in a soft, fine knit with covered elastication at the waist.
Short skirt in an airy cotton weave with a high, elasticated waist and a wide, scallop-edged broderie anglaise flounce at the hem. Lined.
Metal rings, two of which are decorated with plastic stones.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined, drawstring hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined, drawstring hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. Diameter 1.2 cm to 2.5 cm.
Earrings with thin hoop pendants. Length 2.8 cm.
Earrings with thin hoop pendants. Length 2.8 cm.
Metal necklaces with pendants. One shorter, two-strand necklace and one longer one. Adjustable length, 45-52 cm and 68-75 cm.
Three-strand metal necklace with coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Two-strand bracelet in metal chains of different designs, one with coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 18-23 cm.
Two-strand necklace of metal chains in various designs, one with pendants. Adjustable length, 48-54 cm.
Large earrings in metal and plastic. Length 6 cm.
Lace, off-the-shoulder bandeau bra with short sleeves. Mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Thin metal chain necklace with a shell-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 43-51 cm.
Thin metal chain necklace with a shell-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 43-51 cm.

Fleece-lined shell trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, reinforced sections at the back and knees, a reflective strip on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jacket in soft pile with a detachable, jersey-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Cotton jersey lining.
Fitted, rib-knit top in a slightly shorter style with wide shoulder straps.
Fitted, rib-knit top in a slightly shorter style with wide shoulder straps.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Tiered skirt in airy, patterned chiffon with an elasticated waist.
V-neck body in pleated jersey with a sheen. Wrapover top, long raglan sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck body in pleated jersey with a sheen. Wrapover top, long raglan sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless dress in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck and rounded hem. Unlined.
Skirt in a patterned weave with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Wide, straight trousers in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and back pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, straight trousers in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and back pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft chenille rib knit in a wide, slightly boxy style with low dropped shoulders, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft chenille rib knit in a wide, slightly boxy style with low dropped shoulders, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
A-line skirt in organic stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Shoulder bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with two handles, a drawstring and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap at the top. Two larger, zipped inner compartments. Unlined. Size 16x27x34 cm.

Jacket in woven fabric with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Detachable hood lined with soft faux fur, a small stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in fleece.

Jacket in woven fabric with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Detachable hood lined with soft faux fur, a small stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in fleece.
Large shopper in grained imitation leather with decorative metal details, shoulder straps and a magnetic fastener at the top. Size approx. 14.5x42x60 cm.
Short cardigan knitted in fluffy yarn with long sleeves and no buttons.
Short cardigan knitted in fluffy yarn with long sleeves and no buttons.
Short cardigan knitted in fluffy yarn with long sleeves and no buttons.

Bralette in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Support panel between the cups and adjustable shoulder straps. Wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lace trim at the hem.

Bralette in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Support panel between the cups and adjustable shoulder straps. Wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lace trim at the hem.
Joggers in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch pockets and elasticated hems.
3/4-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, straight, wide legs with a pleat at the side, concealed pockets in the side seams and fake back pockets.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a turn-down collar, classic front with press-studs and a yoke at the front and back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Checked shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
